item.description:
Where is the battle?

 

  At 11:59 tonight, or later checkout:

 

http://www.misteriosos.org/

 

What to wear?  

 

Depending which army you want to fight for, wear  green  or  brown.  Swamp Creatures Army = green.  Horse Men Army = brown

Calling all our great pillow warriors back!  

 

It is time for:  Battle for Boston!

 

From the Banditos Misterious web site: "Start your summer right, with the Banditos Misteriosos 4th Annual Water Gun Fight! Reenact the secret origin of Boston’s history, the epic battle between the Back Bay Swamp Creatures and the Revere Horse Men . As everyone knows, the aftermath of this battle resulted in the signing of the Boston Constitution. Staying true to Boston's historical roots, this water gun fight will focus on these two legendary forces, locking horns on the field of battle."

 

The location of the battle and which group we are fighting for will be announced after midnight of the 18th.

 

Orders from Banditos Misterious:

Supplies: - 1 water gun of your choice - Filled two-liter bottles (for refilling your water gun) - 1 backpack to hold water bottles - Your fighting vigor and a love of Boston’s history

 

Rules: Please be aware of electronics during this event; if you see someone with a camera or camcorder, please don't fire at them. Please don’t bring balloons or anything other than regular water for the guns. Also, remember we are using public property; let's be nice to it.

 

Stay wet my friends!
item.name: Wet Wars!
